mapper.insert: insert into tbl_comment (c_no, user_id, b_no, re_group, c_content) values (seq_c_no.nextval, #{user_id}, #{b_no}, seq_c_no.nextval, #{c_content})
insert into tbl_comment ( c_no, user_id, c_content, b_no, parent_c_no, re_group, c_depth ) values ( seq_c_no.nextval, #{user_id}, #{c_content}, #{b_no}, #{parent_c_no}, #{re_group}, 1 )
mapper.select: select a.*, b.user_nick user_nick, b.user_img user_img, c.user_id parent_user_id, c.user_nick parent_user_nick from tbl_comment a left outer join tbl_member b on a.user_id = b.user_id left outer join (select a.*, b.user_nick user_nick from tbl_comment a left outer join tbl_member b on a.user_id = b.user_id ) c on a.parent_c_no = c.c_no where a.b_no = #{b_no} and a.is_del = 'N' order by a.re_group desc, a.c_no asc
mapper.update: update tbl_comment set c_content = #{c_content}, mod_date = sysdate where c_no = #{c_no}
UPDATE tbl_comment SET is_del = 'Y', del_date = sysdate WHERE c_no = #{c_no} AND b_no = #{b_no} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM tbl_comment WHERE parent_c_no = #{c_no})
